channel.title: Using Anaconda with Windows. :: Introduction to ML 1D034 homepage.
channel.description: Disclaimer These instructions come with no warranty. I do not use Windows. If you have any questions about Windows then I cannot answer them. If you have any constructive comments the please contact me. Anaconda is a distribution of Python and R that includes many popular Data Science packages, such as Jupyter Notebook, NumPy, pandas, and scikit-learn. For numerous reasons, it is suggested for working with Jupyter Notebook.
